name: Bounce - Ludum Dare 26
description:
Bounce was created for the Ludum Dare 26 Compo - where the theme was Minimalism. It is a one button platformer where you can stick to the top or bottom of platforms to get around. your "character" can only jump straight up or down and needs platforms to move. The goal is to simply reach the exit of each stage.

Controls: You can use space bar, left mouse button, or touch to charge up to jump. Escape, or back on android resets the game back to the title screen.

There are a ton of little things I would change, but this is the game pretty much as released.  It's difficult to judge timing/speed of platforms, you can't restart just a single stage, and it's not clear that you will pass a platform if impacting on the side. It was my first time using unity, and using boo to make a game.
